original_text: Again, another angel came from the altar where people offered gifts to God. This angel had authority for the fire on the altar. He shouted with a loud voice to the angel who had the sharp knife. He told him, ‘Use your knife and cut the grapes off the earth's vine. The grapes are ready now to make wine.’
korean_text: 또 불을 다스리는 다른 천사가 제단으로부터 나와 예리한 낫 가진 자를 향하여 큰 음성으로 불러 이르되 네 예리한 낫을 휘둘러 땅의 포도송이를 거두라 그 포도가 익었느니라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Again, another angel came from the altar
where people offered gifts to God
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 사람들이 하나님께 예물을 드리는 제단이었습니다

sentences.original_text: This angel had authority for the fire on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 이 천사는 제단의 불에 대한 권위를 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He shouted with a loud voice
to the angel who had the sharp knife
and cut the grapes off the earth's vine
The grapes are ready now to make wine
sentences.korean_translation: 포도들은 이제 포도주를 만들 준비가 되었습니다
